New Records: Payton Pritchard moved ahead of Avery Bradley for ninth place in all-time three-pointers made in Celtics history.
Al Horford hit his 650th three-pointer in Green and White.
Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton finished with 31 points and was instrumental in getting into the paint and finding teammates.
Indiana scored 66 points in the paint.
A 13-0 run by Indiana midway through the final quarter sealed the game.
Jaylen Brown scored back-to-back and-1s to cut the Pacers lead to three in the third quarter.
Jayson Tatum blocked Myles Turner at the rim, leading to a Derrick White layup.
Indiana's Ben Sheppard hit a three and then a layup for a quick 7-0 run.
Indiana went on a 13-0 run to go up 118-103.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indiana won the season series against Boston.
The Pacers shot 58.1% from the floor and 35.7% from three, compared to Boston’s 52.4% from the field and 37% from beyond the arc.
